wikipedia_page.main: Aisling Maria Burnand, MBE (born 22 December 1964) is a British business executive and consultant. In 2009, she joined Cancer Research UK as Executive Director of Policy & Public Affairs. In 2014, she became chief executive of the Association of Medical Research Charities.

response: * Aisling Burnand, Chief Executive, BioIndustry Association. For services to Science.
